title: When I Walk Upon the Earth
description: A collection of eleven poems that capture a moment in life. Time is slowed down and together, we savor the experience.I watch and listen, I taste and smell, I touch and sense... then I gather it all together and offer it to you through my poems.It is important to stop and appreciate the smallest of moments in life, recognize each emotion and attachment. Come with me on my journey. Embrace it.
author: Jacqueline Belle
